医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加强剂可减缓抗体减弱但已达到上限：长期新冠病毒研究揭示了免疫力的局限性该研究追踪了 2020 年至 2023 年纽约医护人员在接种疫苗和感染后对 SARS-CoV-2 抗体反应的长期动力学。研究表明，加强注射后抗体减弱速度较慢，但​​抗体水平存在上限，随着反复接触 SARS-CoV-2 和接种疫苗而逐渐降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Boosters-slow-antibody-waning-but-hit-a-ceiling-Long-term-COVID-study-reveals-limits-of-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Boosters-slow-antibody-waning-but-hit-a-ceiling-Long-term-COVID-study-reveals-limits-of-immunity.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b77034f-c5d6-40ac-8661-9656e25a9b8a Thu, 31 Aug 2023 22:05:00 -0400 Boosters slow antibody waning but hit a ceiling: Long-term COVID study reveals limits of immunity
白尾鹿体内 SARS-CoV-2 的快速进化是否使我们抗击这一流行病的斗争变得更加复杂？新研究揭示了俄亥俄州白尾鹿种群中 SARS-CoV-2 的快速进化，血清阳性率为 25%。研究结果表明存在从动物到人类传播的重大风险，并表明病毒在鹿中的进化速度比在人类中更快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Is-the-rapid-evolution-of-SARS-CoV-2-in-white-tailed-deer-complicating-our-fight-against-the-流行病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Is-the-rapid-evolution-of-SARS-CoV-2-in-white-tailed-deer-complicating-our-fight-against-the-大流行.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04cb92df-08f0-430b-bd29-567b2398428c Thu, 31 Aug 2023 21:56:00 -0400 Is the rapid evolution of SARS-CoV-2 in white-tailed deer complicating our fight against the pandemic?
破解疫苗后新冠病毒保护的密码该研究调查了 176 名接种辉瑞 BNT162b2 疫苗的成年人的抗体水平与行为因素之间的关系，发现较高水平的特异性抗体与针对症状性 COVID-19 的更强保护相关。它还表明当前的商业化验可能需要重新格式化才能更好地预测风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Cracking-the-code-on-post-vaccine-COVID-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Cracking-the-code-on-post-vaccine-COVID-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06cb8981-3be5-4118-aab7-3e94414c5592 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 21:39:00 -0400 Cracking the code on post-vaccine COVID protection
新的血液检测使阿尔茨海默病筛查变得更容易、更准确一种名为 p-tau217 的新血液检测显示出作为阿尔茨海默病生物标志物的前景，当在两步工作流程中使用时，可以非常准确地识别或排除大脑淀粉样变性（最重要和最早的病理学）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Alzheimers-screening-just-got-easier-more-accurate-with-new-blood-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Alzheimers-screening-just-got-easier-more-accurate-with-new-blood-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a40c21dd-391a-46d3-a400-801b364529ed Thu, 31 Aug 2023 20:59:44 -0400 Alzheimer's screening just got easier, more accurate with new blood test
电噪声刺激可提高大脑兴奋性较低的人的数学技能萨里大学、牛津大学、拉夫堡大学和荷兰拉德堡德大学的一项新研究表明，使用电噪声刺激刺激大脑区域可以帮助那些在数学问题上遇到困难的人提高数学学习能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Electrical-noise-stimulation-boosts-math-skills-in-individuals-with-lower-brain-excitability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Electrical-noise-stimulation-boosts-math-skills-in-individuals-with-lower-brain-excitability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3aa50b8-01fa-412c-95eb-ce8d2c64b92d Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:53:44 -0400 Electrical noise stimulation boosts math skills in individuals with lower brain excitability
研究探讨了数字媒体使用与年轻人精神病经历之间的关联加拿大的年轻人平均每天花几个小时在智能手机上。许多人从 TikTok 跳到 Netflix 再到 Instagram，放下手机只是为了拿起视频游戏控制器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-explores-associations- Between-digital-media-use-and-psychotic-experiences-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-explores-associations- Between-digital-media-use-and-psychotic-experiences-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5a741a7-76b4-414f-940b-793008610d5f Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:45:45 -0400 Study explores associations between digital media use and psychotic experiences in young adults
婴儿配方奶粉中的 MFGM 补充剂与长期认知益处相关母乳被广泛认为是对婴儿最有益的营养，但许多家庭在母乳喂养方面面临医疗或后勤方面的挑战。根据疾病控制中心的数据，在美国，只有 45% 的婴儿在 3 个月大时继续纯母乳喂养。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/MFGM-supplement-in-infant-formula-linked-to-long-term-cognitive-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/MFGM-supplement-in-infant-formula-linked-to-long-term-cognitive-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d391d21-f4b1-4783-b0a8-dbb45e2cb9d5 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:27:10 -0400 MFGM supplement in infant formula linked to long-term cognitive benefits
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：您应该认识的 3 位健康政策专家在本期特别节目中，KFF 健康新闻驻华盛顿首席记者朱莉·罗夫纳 (Julie Rovner) 采访了三位著名的卫生政策专家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-3-health-policy-experts-you-should-know.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-3-health-policy-experts-you-should-know.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e71d4ec-ad12-450f-97b5-4e88bd88287d Thu, 31 Aug 2023 15:17:59 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What The Health?': 3 health policy experts you should know
研究发现，大流行可能改变了婴儿的肠道微生物组一组发展心理学研究人员表示，在大流行中度过第一年大部分时间的婴儿肠道内的细菌类型比出生较早的婴儿要少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Pandemic-may-have-altered-gut-microbiome-of-infants-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Pandemic-may-have-altered-gut-microbiome-of-infants-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=702620db-6d06-442d-99db-94210f7c16a0 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:49:30 -0400 Pandemic may have altered gut microbiome of infants, study finds
最大的癫痫基因研究发现新的风险基因由国际抗癫痫联盟（International League Against Epilepsy）协调进行的此类最大规模的基因研究，其中包括 RCSI 医学与健康科学大学 FutureNeuro 的科学家，发现我们 DNA 中的特定变化会增加患癫痫的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Largest-genic-study-of-epilepsy-finds-new-risk-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Largest-genic-study-of-epilepsy-finds-new-risk-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=747d8b1e-4929-43c6-91ee-1308f2d70b3b Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:41:14 -0400 Largest genetic study of epilepsy finds new risk genes
